document.full_text: in hiring, barry salzberg, the next global chief of deloitte touche tohmatsu, says he tries to make sure that the candidate and the company are perfect for each other.
document.title: corner office: barry salzberg: the right job? it's much like the right spouse
lines_and_colors: in hiring, barry salzberg, the next global chief of deloitte touche tohmatsu, says he tries to make sure that the candidate and the company are perfect for each other.
